name: Rickkey Dickson
description: I am just a simple man, very honest and interesting personality. I speak English language i love to go to the beach and watch the ocean tide i like to play golf and meet new people i like to go camping fishing hiking and swimming I’m looking for a soul mate a woman that have the hear to love and be loved a woman i can call a wife i like to be with a hard working woman with good sense of humor so that we can share jokes and lot of laugh i hate lies and women who like to take advantage of men who loved them and i hate unfaithful woman and woman that has no time for me always busy i want to have a happy life with a lovely and caring woman.I love to read novels and i like Daniel steal and Mario puzzo.I like pop and Country music.I have a dog as a pet his is my closest friend
